description: Load a shapefile layer into Bigquery
name: Shapefile to Bigquery

parameters.helpText: Google Cloud Storage URL of Shapefile zip, e.g. gs://<bucket>/<path>.zip
parameters.label: gcs_url
parameters.name: gcs_url

parameters.helpText: Bigquery Dataset that contains your destination table
parameters.label: dataset
parameters.name: dataset

parameters.helpText: Name of the layer to read from the shapefile
parameters.label: layer_name
parameters.name: layer_name

parameters.helpText: manually override the source projection with an EPSG code
parameters.label: epsg
parameters.name: in_epsg
